title: Pacific - The Ocean of the Future (2015).epub Gooner
description:
Pacific - The Ocean of the Future (2015).epub Gooner

Publisher: William Collins (22 Oct. 2015)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0007550758
ISBN-13: 978-0007550753

Travelling the circumference of the truly gigantic Pacific, Simon Winchester tells the story of the worldâ€™s largest body of water, and â€“ in matters economic, political and military â€“ the ocean of the future.

The Pacific is a world of tsunamis and Magellan, of the Bounty mutiny and the Boeing Company. It is the stuff of the towering Captain Cook and his wide-ranging network of exploring voyages, Robert Louis Stevenson and Admiral Halsey. It is the place of Paul Gauguin and the explosion of the largest-ever American atomic bomb, on Bikini atoll, in 1951. It has an astonishing recent past, an uncertain present and a hugely important future.

The ocean and its peoples are the new lifeblood, fizz and thrill of America â€“ which draws so many of its minds and so much of its manners from the sea â€“ while the inexorable rise of the ancient center of the world, China, is a fixating fascination. The presence of rogue states â€“ North Korea most notoriously today â€“ suggest that the focus of the responsible world is shifting away from the conventional post-war obsessions with Europe and the Middle East, and towards a new set of urgencies. Navigating the newly evolving patterns of commerce and trade, the worldâ€™s most violent weather and the fascinating histories, problems and potentials of the many Pacific states, Simon Winchesterâ€™s thrilling journey is a grand depiction of the future ocean
